metadata.name: Dancing Baby & Frens
metadata.description:
Introduction

Memes, the imitated expressions of humor, have become a global phenomenon in social engagement. One of the first big internet memes was the "Dancing Baby‚Äù, a 3D-rendered animation that went viral in 1996, marking the birth of internet memes.

To commemorate its 27th birthday and its journey into the future, on April 27, 2023, Roger Haus is unveiling an exclusive representation of this iconic meme in his unique style, infused with awesome summer vibes.

Properties

The artwork by Roger Haus is an original 1/1 infinite loop, frame by frame animation with a soundtrack, in 2480 x 2480 MP4 format. It is also part of the longest digital art sequence of the "Exquisite Corpse", released daily on Exquisite Workers' Instagram in 2020-2023.

1st Edition of the "Dancing Baby NFT", March 2022

https://foundation.app/collection/dancingbaby

2nd Edition with Roger Haus, April 2023

https://foundation.app/world/dancingbaby
